greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array read by rows: T(j,k) = k*(j-k)! for k < j, T(j,k) = 1 for k = j; 1 <= k <= j.
comment: T is also defined in A129867, which gives row sums of T.
example: First seven rows of T are
program: (MAGMA) m:=11; &cat[ [ k*Factorial(j-k): k in [1..j-1] ] cat [ 1 ]: j in [1..m] ];
xref: Cf. A129867, A130470 (antidiagonal sums), A130471 (first differences of antidiagonal sums).
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, May 28 2007
